Game.Name: SD Keiji - Blader (Japan)
Game.plot: SD Keiji: Blader is a Role-Playing game, developed by NMK and published by Taito Corporation,which was released in Japan in 1991.Cheat: CRC Test and CreditsOn Player 2's controller, press Up, A, and B, hold them, and reset the console. Release the buttons and the CRC test is formed. If you wish to view the game's credits, during this test, press Right, A, and B simultaneously on the second controller.
Game.Notes: SD Keiji: Blader is a Role-Playing game, developed by NMK and published by Taito Corporation, which was released in Japan in 1991.
